doc:
Bryant Haliday https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bryant_Haliday 0 Bryant Haliday (7 April 1928 – 28 July 1996) was an American actor, as well as producer, of film and stage, who was instrumental in providing a showcase for international film titles in the United States by co-founding Janus Films with his partner Cyrus Harvey, Jr. Bryant_Haliday ( 7_April_1928 – 28_July_1996 ) was an_American_actor , as_well_as producer , of film_and_stage , who was instrumental in providing a_showcase for international_film_titles in the_United_States by co-founding Janus_Films with his_partner_Cyrus_Harvey , Jr .
